snippet: Jim Courier, the American captain, plans to face No. 1 Novak Djokovic and Serbia in the Davis Cup quarterfinals with Sam Querrey, John Isner, and Bob and Mike Bryan.
lead_paragraph: Jim Courier, the American captain, plans to face No. 1 Novak Djokovic and Serbia in the Davis Cup quarterfinals with Sam Querrey, John Isner, and Bob and Mike Bryan.
